content: hiya! @Chris Fallin (i hope the right person) could i get an invite to the cranelift weekly meetings? when i find some time i'd like to discuss what officially supporting no_std in cranelift might look like. my email is me@gus.host
@snek done! If you want to have a particular discussion it might be a good idea to add it to the agenda ahead of time, too; you can do a PR against bytecodealliance/meetings to add it.
